0.1.name: wordpress/belindes-bricks-box
0.1.description:
Belinde's Brick Box is a collation of common tools useful in plugin's developing. It provides an highly configurable CRUD (Create - Read - Update - Delete) for database tables and others data structures, AJAX grids features, options management and so on.

At the moment, this plugin is under heavy development... You can test it, but lacks in feature and documentation. Stay tuned for updates!
